texts.description: The file defines localized string for MAM ticketing functions.

text.value: An error occurred while logging the user in. This may be due to incorrect credentials or an invalid ticket.
Unable to log in because the account is pending.
Unable to log in because the account is inactive.
An error occurred while creating necessary objects.
Unable to log in because it is disallowed by the account's state.
Attempt to create the COM secure store failed.
Gateway.xml is not valid XML or does not exist.
Unable to find a localized site for the specified provider ID.
